name: Shaped Together
description:
Download Version is available if the browser doesn't work.

Welcome to Shaped Together, where you control Cubrix to solve all the puzzles by filling in all the keyholes in each level.

Controls:

USE W TO JUMP. 

 USE A AND D TO MOVE LEFT AND RIGHT. 

 USE R TO RESET THE LEVEL. 

 USE ESCAPE TO RETURN TO THE LEVEL SELECT SCREEN.

USE LEFT SHIFT AND W, A, S, OR D TO REMOVE ALL THE SHAPES THAT IS ABOVE, TO YOUR LEFT, BELOW, OR TO YOUR RIGHT.
